name: Social Share Block
author: WPDeveloper

sections.description:
Share all your posts and content on popular social platforms seamlessly with one click using Social Share Gutenberg block.

With this stunning plugin, you can add social share buttons on your post or page any place you want. In addition, you can share your posts on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and any other social media platform you prefer. Without any coding, you will get full control in the block‚Äôs design & customizations.

Note: Plugin will not work on local server. You should have an online website for the plugin to function properly.

Why Should You Get Social Share Block:

  • No configuration needed
  • Direct share to chosen social platforms
  • Add as many custom platform icons as you want
  • Floating social share buttons with scrolling effect
  • Include custom shapes, alignments, hover effects, margins, padding, etc

Completely Customizable: You can customize Social Share Block just the way you want.

Super Light-weight: No extra resources are used and it‚Äôs highly optimized for super fast loading & instant live editing.

Dedicated Support: We have an extraordinary support team ready to help you. Ask your questions in the support forum, we‚Äôll get back to you immediately.

üöÄ BACKED BY A TRUSTED TEAM

sections.installation:
Modern Way:

  1. Go to the WordPress Block/Gutenberg Editor
  2. Search For “Social Share Block”.
  3. Install in 1-click

Old Way:

  1. Upload social-share-block to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Follow the Documentation
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.

upgrade_notice.2.0.0: New version of Social Share block is available from version 2.0.0. Updating to the new version will break existing functionality & have to create the section from scratch with updated version.
